playbooks.name: New Market Entrant (Funded Startup)
playbooks.trigger: VC-backed competitor enters your core market segment
playbooks.response: Competitive positioning, pricing strategy, product acceleration

playbooks.name: New Market Entrant (Established Player)
playbooks.trigger: Fortune 500 company announces entry into your market
playbooks.response: Partnership exploration, differentiation strategy, market defense

playbooks.name: Competitor Product Launch (Feature Parity)
playbooks.trigger: Competitor releases product matching your core capabilities
playbooks.response: Feature acceleration, messaging pivot, customer retention

playbooks.name: Competitor Product Launch (Breakthrough Innovation)
playbooks.trigger: Competitor announces technology that leapfrogs your offerings
playbooks.response: Technology assessment, R&D pivot, market repositioning

playbooks.name: Aggressive Pricing Disruption
playbooks.trigger: Competitor cuts prices 30%+ or introduces disruptive pricing model
playbooks.response: Value proposition reinforcement, pricing analysis, margin defense

playbooks.name: Patent Infringement Claim (Incoming)
playbooks.trigger: Competitor alleges your product infringes their patents
playbooks.response: Legal defense, product review, prior art search

playbooks.name: Patent Infringement Claim (Outgoing)
playbooks.trigger: Discovery that competitor may be infringing your patents
playbooks.response: Legal assessment, enforcement strategy, licensing negotiation

playbooks.name: Key Talent Poaching Campaign
playbooks.trigger: Competitor systematically recruiting your top talent (5+ departures)
playbooks.response: Retention offers, culture reinforcement, talent pipeline acceleration

playbooks.name: Competitor M&A (Consolidation)
playbooks.trigger: Two competitors merge, creating larger rival
playbooks.response: Competitive reassessment, partnership exploration, market positioning

playbooks.name: Competitor Acquires Strategic Asset
playbooks.trigger: Competitor buys key supplier, distributor, or technology company
playbooks.response: Supply chain security, alternative partnerships, M&A response

playbooks.name: Channel Conflict (Direct vs. Partner)
playbooks.trigger: Channel partners threaten to drop your product
playbooks.response: Partner negotiation, channel strategy revision, conflict resolution

playbooks.name: Customer Consolidation to Competitor
playbooks.trigger: Major customer announces switch to competitor (>$5M ARR)
playbooks.response: Save campaign, relationship repair, product gap analysis

playbooks.name: Sales Team Defection
playbooks.trigger: Competitor hires your top sales reps (3+ in quarter)
playbooks.response: Client relationship protection, pipeline recovery, compensation review

playbooks.name: Geographic Market Entry by Competitor
playbooks.trigger: Competitor enters your stronghold geography
playbooks.response: Regional defense, local partnerships, market protection

playbooks.name: Negative Comparison Campaign
playbooks.trigger: Competitor launches marketing attacking your product
playbooks.response: Counter-messaging, factual correction, legal assessment

playbooks.name: Customer Advisory Board Defection
playbooks.trigger: Strategic advisory board members join competitor board
playbooks.response: Relationship repair, board reconstitution, loyalty reinforcement

playbooks.name: Competitor Launches Free/Freemium Tier
playbooks.trigger: Competitor introduces free version of paid product
playbooks.response: Business model assessment, value differentiation, customer communication

playbooks.name: Industry Standards Battle
playbooks.trigger: Competitor attempts to establish incompatible industry standard
playbooks.response: Coalition building, standards participation, interoperability strategy

playbooks.name: Primary Supplier Failure
playbooks.trigger: Main supplier experiences bankruptcy, fire, or production halt
playbooks.response: Alternative supplier activation, inventory management, production continuity

playbooks.name: Critical Component Shortage
playbooks.trigger: Industry-wide shortage of essential component (chips, raw materials)
playbooks.response: Substitute sourcing, production prioritization, customer allocation

playbooks.name: Transportation/Logistics Disruption
playbooks.trigger: Strike, natural disaster, or infrastructure failure blocks distribution
playbooks.response: Alternative routing, customer communication, fulfillment workarounds

playbooks.name: Quality Defect Discovery (Pre-Ship)
playbooks.trigger: Critical quality issue found before product ships
playbooks.response: Production halt, root cause analysis, customer communication

playbooks.name: Quality Defect Discovery (Post-Ship)
playbooks.trigger: Critical quality issue discovered in field/customer site
playbooks.response: Field remediation, customer notification, regulatory reporting

playbooks.name: Supplier Price Shock
playbooks.trigger: Supplier increases prices 20%+ due to force majeure
playbooks.response: Cost absorption analysis, pricing adjustment, alternative sourcing

playbooks.name: Manufacturing Facility Disruption
playbooks.trigger: Fire, flood, equipment failure halts production facility
playbooks.response: Production rerouting, capacity reallocation, recovery planning

playbooks.name: Warehouse/Distribution Center Failure
playbooks.trigger: Primary distribution center becomes inoperable
playbooks.response: Inventory redistribution, alternative fulfillment, delivery recovery

playbooks.name: Data Center Outage
playbooks.trigger: Primary data center experiences extended outage
playbooks.response: Failover execution, customer communication, service restoration

playbooks.name: Office Evacuation (Safety Threat)
playbooks.trigger: Bomb threat, gas leak, or safety issue requires building evacuation
playbooks.response: Employee safety, remote work activation, facility security

playbooks.name: Natural Disaster (Facility Impact)
playbooks.trigger: Hurricane, earthquake, flood impacts primary operations
playbooks.response: Employee safety, operations continuity, recovery coordination

playbooks.name: Pandemic/Health Crisis
playbooks.trigger: Infectious disease outbreak impacts workforce/operations
playbooks.response: Remote work activation, safety protocols, business continuity

playbooks.name: Critical Vendor Service Interruption
playbooks.trigger: Essential SaaS provider, cloud host, or service experiences outage
playbooks.response: Backup activation, vendor escalation, customer notification

playbooks.name: Technology Partner Bankruptcy
playbooks.trigger: Critical technology partner files bankruptcy/ceases operations
playbooks.response: Technology migration, intellectual property protection, alternative sourcing

playbooks.name: Payment Processor Disruption
playbooks.trigger: Payment gateway, merchant services, or banking disruption
playbooks.response: Alternative payment activation, customer communication, transaction recovery

playbooks.name: Critical API/Integration Failure
playbooks.trigger: Essential third-party API service fails or changes unexpectedly
playbooks.response: Integration repair, fallback mode, customer impact mitigation

playbooks.name: Cash Flow Crisis
playbooks.trigger: Cash runway drops below 6 months, unexpected burn spike
playbooks.response: Cost reduction, fundraising acceleration, bridge financing

playbooks.name: Failed Fundraising Round
playbooks.trigger: Expected investment round falls through or significantly delayed
playbooks.response: Alternative financing, burn reduction, strategic options

playbooks.name: Bank Credit Line Revocation
playbooks.trigger: Bank reduces or eliminates line of credit
playbooks.response: Alternative lender sourcing, liquidity preservation, covenant negotiation

playbooks.name: Major Customer Payment Default
playbooks.trigger: Large customer fails to pay invoice (>$1M outstanding)
playbooks.response: Payment recovery, credit policy revision, cash flow management

playbooks.name: Currency Crisis (FX Exposure)
playbooks.trigger: Significant currency devaluation impacts international revenue/costs
playbooks.response: Hedging strategy, pricing adjustment, expense management

playbooks.name: Stock Price Crash (Public Company)
playbooks.trigger: Stock price drops 30%+ in single session or week
playbooks.response: Investor communication, analyst briefing, stability messaging

playbooks.name: Activist Investor Campaign
playbooks.trigger: Activist shareholder takes significant position, demands changes
playbooks.response: Investor engagement, defense strategy, board communication

playbooks.name: Hostile Takeover Attempt
playbooks.trigger: Unsolicited acquisition offer or proxy fight initiated
playbooks.response: Defense activation, shareholder communication, strategic alternatives

playbooks.name: Credit Rating Downgrade
playbooks.trigger: Rating agency lowers credit rating, impacts borrowing costs
playbooks.response: Investor communication, capital structure optimization, rating agency engagement

playbooks.name: Revenue Shortfall (Miss Guidance)
playbooks.trigger: Quarter tracking significantly below public guidance
playbooks.response: Guidance revision, investor communication, recovery plan

playbooks.name: Accounting Irregularity Discovery
playbooks.trigger: Internal audit discovers material accounting error or policy violation
playbooks.response: Investigation, restatement assessment, disclosure planning

playbooks.name: Auditor Disagreement
playbooks.trigger: External auditor challenges accounting treatment or control
playbooks.response: Resolution negotiation, documentation, potential restatement

playbooks.name: Financial Control Failure
playbooks.trigger: Material weakness in internal controls discovered
playbooks.response: Remediation plan, disclosure, control enhancement

playbooks.name: Unexpected Tax Liability
playbooks.trigger: Tax authority assessment or audit findings create material liability
playbooks.response: Assessment challenge, settlement negotiation, reserve establishment

playbooks.name: SEC Investigation Notice
playbooks.trigger: Securities and Exchange Commission opens investigation
playbooks.response: External counsel engagement, document preservation, cooperation strategy

playbooks.name: DOJ/Criminal Investigation
playbooks.trigger: Department of Justice initiates criminal investigation
playbooks.response: Criminal defense counsel, privilege protection, crisis management

playbooks.name: FTC Antitrust Investigation
playbooks.trigger: Federal Trade Commission investigates competitive practices
playbooks.response: Antitrust defense, practice review, regulator cooperation

playbooks.name: State Attorney General Investigation
playbooks.trigger: State AG launches consumer protection or business practice investigation
playbooks.response: Legal response, practice assessment, settlement exploration

playbooks.name: Congressional Investigation/Hearing
playbooks.trigger: Congressional committee requests testimony or documents
playbooks.response: Testimony preparation, document production, public affairs strategy

playbooks.name: Data Privacy Violation (GDPR/CCPA)
playbooks.trigger: Discovery of data protection law violation or regulatory complaint
playbooks.response: Regulatory notification, remediation, affected party communication

playbooks.name: Export Control Violation
playbooks.trigger: Discovery of unauthorized export of controlled technology
playbooks.response: Voluntary disclosure, shipment investigation, license application

playbooks.name: Environmental Compliance Violation
playbooks.trigger: EPA or state environmental agency violation notice
playbooks.response: Compliance restoration, agency negotiation, remediation plan

playbooks.name: Workplace Safety Violation (OSHA)
playbooks.trigger: OSHA citation or serious workplace injury investigation
playbooks.response: Safety remediation, worker protection, OSHA negotiation

playbooks.name: Financial Services Compliance Breach
playbooks.trigger: Banking, securities, or financial regulation violation
playbooks.response: Regulatory notification, remediation, penalty negotiation

playbooks.name: Class Action Lawsuit Filed
playbooks.trigger: Class action complaint filed (securities, consumer, employment)
playbooks.response: Defense counsel engagement, motion to dismiss, settlement assessment

playbooks.name: Intellectual Property Litigation
playbooks.trigger: Patent, trademark, or copyright lawsuit filed
playbooks.response: IP counsel engagement, validity assessment, defense or settlement

playbooks.name: Major Contract Dispute
playbooks.trigger: Customer or partner files breach of contract lawsuit
playbooks.response: Legal defense, commercial negotiation, relationship management

playbooks.name: Employment Discrimination Lawsuit
playbooks.trigger: Employee or EEOC files discrimination claim
playbooks.response: Legal defense, investigation, policy review

playbooks.name: Product Liability Lawsuit
playbooks.trigger: Customer injury or property damage attributed to product
playbooks.response: Legal defense, investigation, recall assessment

playbooks.name: Data Breach (Customer Data)
playbooks.trigger: Unauthorized access to customer PII, payment, or sensitive data
playbooks.response: Containment, forensics, customer notification, regulatory reporting

playbooks.name: Ransomware Attack
playbooks.trigger: Ransomware encrypts critical systems, ransom demanded
playbooks.response: Isolation, recovery from backup, law enforcement notification, ransom evaluation

playbooks.name: DDoS Attack
playbooks.trigger: Distributed denial of service attack disrupts services
playbooks.response: Traffic mitigation, ISP coordination, customer communication

playbooks.name: Insider Threat (Malicious Employee)
playbooks.trigger: Employee discovered stealing data, sabotaging systems, or fraud
playbooks.response: Access termination, forensic investigation, legal action, damage assessment

playbooks.name: Third-Party Data Breach (Vendor)
playbooks.trigger: Vendor breach exposes your company or customer data
playbooks.response: Impact assessment, vendor accountability, customer notification

playbooks.name: Vulnerability Disclosure (Zero-Day)
playbooks.trigger: Critical security vulnerability discovered in your product
playbooks.response: Patch development, customer notification, coordinated disclosure

playbooks.name: Critical System Outage (SaaS)
playbooks.trigger: Primary application experiences extended downtime
playbooks.response: Incident response, customer communication, root cause analysis, SLA credits

playbooks.name: Database Corruption/Loss
playbooks.trigger: Database corruption or data loss affects operations or customer data
playbooks.response: Data recovery, integrity verification, backup restoration, customer notification

playbooks.name: Cloud Provider Outage
playbooks.trigger: AWS, Azure, or GCP region failure impacts services
playbooks.response: Failover execution, provider escalation, customer communication

playbooks.name: Software Update/Release Failure
playbooks.trigger: New software release causes critical bugs or system instability
playbooks.response: Rollback, hotfix, customer communication, quality process review

playbooks.name: Integration/API Breaking Change
playbooks.trigger: System integration or API change breaks customer workflows
playbooks.response: Fix deployment, customer support, migration assistance

playbooks.name: End-of-Life Technology Dependency
playbooks.trigger: Critical technology stack component reaches EOL, vendor discontinues support
playbooks.response: Migration planning, alternative evaluation, timeline communication

playbooks.name: Technology Standards Shift
playbooks.trigger: Industry adopts new standard making your technology approach obsolete
playbooks.response: Roadmap pivot, standards adoption, customer migration support

playbooks.name: CEO Sudden Departure
playbooks.trigger: CEO resignation, termination, illness, or death
playbooks.response: Succession activation, stakeholder communication, interim leadership

playbooks.name: Executive Team Member Departure (Unexpected)
playbooks.trigger: C-level executive sudden resignation or termination
playbooks.response: Interim coverage, transition plan, external/internal search

playbooks.name: Board Member Resignation
playbooks.trigger: Board member resigns unexpectedly or amid controversy
playbooks.response: Board composition assessment, replacement search, governance continuity

playbooks.name: Mass Layoff/RIF Execution
playbooks.trigger: Company announces significant workforce reduction
playbooks.response: Legal compliance, employee communication, morale management, media handling

playbooks.name: Key Talent Attrition Spike
playbooks.trigger: Abnormal increase in voluntary departures (>20% above baseline)
playbooks.response: Stay interviews, compensation review, culture assessment, retention plan

playbooks.name: Critical Role Vacancy (Unfillable)
playbooks.trigger: Unable to fill essential technical or leadership role for 6+ months
playbooks.response: Recruiting strategy pivot, compensation adjustment, contractor/interim solution

playbooks.name: Unionization Campaign
playbooks.trigger: Union begins organizing campaign at non-union facility
playbooks.response: Labor counsel engagement, supervisor training, employee communication

playbooks.name: Workplace Violence Threat
playbooks.trigger: Credible threat of violence from employee or external party
playbooks.response: Threat assessment, law enforcement notification, protective measures

playbooks.name: Employee Misconduct (Senior Leader)
playbooks.trigger: Allegations of harassment, discrimination, or ethical violation by senior leader
playbooks.response: Investigation, suspension, legal counsel, stakeholder communication

playbooks.name: Glassdoor/Public Review Crisis
playbooks.trigger: Wave of negative employee reviews damages employer brand
playbooks.response: Internal listening, issue remediation, employer brand recovery

playbooks.name: Strike or Work Stoppage
playbooks.trigger: Union authorizes strike or employees stage walkout
playbooks.response: Operations continuity, negotiation, employee communication

playbooks.name: Diversity & Inclusion Crisis
playbooks.trigger: Public allegations of systemic discrimination or hostile culture
playbooks.response: Investigation, remediation plan, transparency, stakeholder communication

playbooks.name: Negative Investigative Journalism
playbooks.trigger: Major media outlet publishes damaging investigative piece
playbooks.response: Fact correction, media statement, stakeholder briefing

playbooks.name: Social Media Firestorm
playbooks.trigger: Viral negative social media campaign against company
playbooks.response: Social monitoring, response strategy, influencer engagement

playbooks.name: Boycott Campaign
playbooks.trigger: Organized consumer boycott of products/services
playbooks.response: Issue assessment, dialogue, stakeholder engagement, positioning

playbooks.name: Executive Personal Scandal
playbooks.trigger: CEO or senior executive personal conduct becomes public scandal
playbooks.response: Executive status assessment, crisis communication, separation if necessary

playbooks.name: Misinformation/Fake News Attack
playbooks.trigger: False information about company spreads virally
playbooks.response: Fact verification, correction campaign, platform notification

playbooks.name: Viral Customer Complaint
playbooks.trigger: Customer service failure becomes viral sensation
playbooks.response: Individual resolution, systemic fix, public apology, policy change

playbooks.name: Product Recall (Safety)
playbooks.trigger: Product safety issue requires voluntary or mandated recall
playbooks.response: Recall execution, customer notification, regulatory compliance, replacement program

playbooks.name: Service Level Agreement Mass Breach
playbooks.trigger: Widespread SLA violations trigger contractual penalties
playbooks.response: Customer communication, credit processing, service restoration, root cause

playbooks.name: Major Customer Public Criticism
playbooks.trigger: Prominent customer publicly criticizes company/product
playbooks.response: Relationship repair, issue resolution, narrative management

playbooks.name: ESG Rating Downgrade
playbooks.trigger: Environmental, social, governance rating significantly drops
playbooks.response: Issue remediation, investor communication, ESG improvement plan

playbooks.name: Short Seller Report
playbooks.trigger: Short seller publishes research alleging fraud or business problems
playbooks.response: Fact rebuttal, investor communication, legal assessment

playbooks.name: Partner Relationship Termination
playbooks.trigger: Strategic partner publicly ends relationship amid controversy
playbooks.response: Relationship salvage attempt, alternative partnerships, market communication

playbooks.name: Industry Award/Certification Revocation
playbooks.trigger: Industry body revokes certification, ranking, or award
playbooks.response: Remediation, reinstatement effort, alternative recognition

playbooks.name: Recession/Economic Downturn
playbooks.trigger: Economic indicators signal recession, demand collapse anticipated
playbooks.response: Cost structure optimization, scenario planning, customer retention focus

playbooks.name: Interest Rate Shock
playbooks.trigger: Rapid interest rate increases impact capital costs, customer buying
playbooks.response: Capital structure adjustment, pricing strategy, demand management

playbooks.name: Trade War/Tariff Imposition
playbooks.trigger: New tariffs or trade restrictions impact supply chain or markets
playbooks.response: Supply chain adjustment, pricing strategy, geographic diversification

playbooks.name: AI/Automation Disrupts Business Model
playbooks.trigger: AI technology enables competitors to deliver service at fraction of cost
playbooks.response: Technology adoption, business model evolution, workforce transition

playbooks.name: Platform Shift (Cloud, Mobile, etc.)
playbooks.trigger: Market rapidly adopts new platform, rendering current approach obsolete
playbooks.response: Platform migration, product roadmap pivot, go-to-market adjustment

playbooks.name: Disintermediation Threat
playbooks.trigger: Technology enables customers to bypass your value chain position
playbooks.response: Value proposition evolution, direct channel, business model innovation

playbooks.name: New Regulation Impacts Business Model
playbooks.trigger: New law or regulation makes current business model illegal or uneconomical
playbooks.response: Compliance strategy, business model adaptation, advocacy/lobbying

playbooks.name: Geographic Market Regulatory Change
playbooks.trigger: Key market implements regulations restricting operations
playbooks.response: Compliance assessment, market exit/adaptation, geographic diversification

playbooks.name: Industry Consolidation Wave
playbooks.trigger: Multiple competitors merge, fundamentally changing industry structure
playbooks.response: Strategic positioning, M&A consideration, partnership strategy

playbooks.name: Strategic Market Entry - Multi-Brand Launch
playbooks.trigger: Major market rebound creates strategic window for simultaneous multi-brand expansion
playbooks.response: Coordinate 10+ brand launches across multiple cities, retail real estate activation, capital deployment, Golden Week timing

playbooks.name: Trend Capitalization - Viral Fashion Response
playbooks.trigger: Viral social media trend (47M+ views) with 21-day lifecycle and $180M+ revenue potential detected
playbooks.response: Coordinate 5000+ suppliers, design 200 SKUs, launch in 7 days to capture 65% market share before competitors

playbooks.name: Launch Schedule Acceleration
playbooks.trigger: Favorable orbital window opens 3 days early with vacant slot from competitor delay
playbooks.response: Accelerate launch by 72 hours, coordinate FAA/Space Force approvals, payload preparation, ground operations

playbooks.name: SWIFT/Payment System Disruption
playbooks.trigger: International payment rails fail or experience cyberattack
playbooks.response: Alternative payment routing, Fed coordination, customer notification, transaction recovery

playbooks.name: Algorithmic Trading Malfunction
playbooks.trigger: Trading algorithm goes rogue or executes unauthorized trades
playbooks.response: Circuit breaker activation, market maker notifications, regulatory filing, client protection

playbooks.name: Liquidity Crisis / Bank Run
playbooks.trigger: Bank run begins (digital or physical) threatening solvency
playbooks.response: Fed liquidity line activation, customer reassurance, regulatory coordination, media management

playbooks.name: Correspondent Bank Failure
playbooks.trigger: Key banking partner collapses or ceases operations
playbooks.response: Payment rerouting, alternative correspondent activation, client notification, transaction continuity

playbooks.name: Crypto/Digital Asset Incident
playbooks.trigger: Digital custody breach or crypto platform failure
playbooks.response: Blockchain forensics, regulatory notification, customer protection, insurance claim

playbooks.name: Tier 2 Supplier Cascade Failure
playbooks.trigger: Supplier's supplier fails, invisible to OEM until production halt
playbooks.response: Supply chain mapping, alternative sourcing, production prioritization, customer allocation

playbooks.name: Critical Tooling Failure
playbooks.trigger: Specialized manufacturing equipment breaks with long lead time for replacement
playbooks.response: Production rerouting, emergency tooling procurement, capacity reallocation, delivery delays

playbooks.name: Labor Strike/Walkout
playbooks.trigger: UAW or key facility workers strike, halting production
playbooks.response: Negotiation strategy, production continuity, alternative facilities, customer communication

playbooks.name: Commodity Price Spike
playbooks.trigger: Steel, aluminum, or critical commodity prices surge 40%+ overnight
playbooks.response: Hedging strategy, pricing adjustment, supplier renegotiation, margin protection

playbooks.name: Sustainability/ESG Crisis
playbooks.trigger: Environmental audit finds violations or sustainability commitments at risk
playbooks.response: Compliance remediation, stakeholder communication, sustainability program overhaul, reporting

playbooks.name: Pipeline Rupture/Environmental Release
playbooks.trigger: Oil spill, gas leak, or major environmental contamination event
playbooks.response: Emergency containment, evacuation coordination, regulatory notification, cleanup mobilization

playbooks.name: Renewable Integration Failure
playbooks.trigger: Wind/solar integration causes grid instability or cascading failures
playbooks.response: Load balancing, backup generation activation, grid stabilization, regulatory coordination

playbooks.name: Commodity Trading Desk Rogue Trader
playbooks.trigger: Trader exceeds limits causing massive losses or market manipulation
playbooks.response: Position liquidation, regulatory self-reporting, internal investigation, market stabilization

playbooks.name: Major Customer Bankruptcy
playbooks.trigger: Largest industrial customer files Chapter 11, threatening revenue
playbooks.response: Credit protection, alternative customer development, capacity reallocation, financial hedging

playbooks.name: Climate Protest/Facility Occupation
playbooks.trigger: Activists block operations or occupy facilities
playbooks.response: Safety protocols, legal action, stakeholder communication, operational continuity

playbooks.name: API Deprecation Crisis
playbooks.trigger: Breaking API change affects major customers, causing integration failures
playbooks.response: Rollback decision, migration support, customer communication, compatibility fixes

playbooks.name: Viral Bug/Feature Backfire
playbooks.trigger: New feature causes user outrage or viral negative reaction
playbooks.response: Feature rollback, user communication, damage control, product adjustment

playbooks.name: Acquisition Integration Failure
playbooks.trigger: M&A integration goes wrong, customers fleeing, culture clash
playbooks.response: Customer retention, culture intervention, integration reset, stakeholder management

playbooks.name: Developer Exodus
playbooks.trigger: Key engineers quit en masse, threatening product roadmap
playbooks.response: Retention campaign, hiring acceleration, roadmap adjustment, knowledge transfer

playbooks.name: Open Source Controversy
playbooks.trigger: OSS community revolts against licensing change or corporate action
playbooks.response: Community engagement, licensing clarification, relationship repair, fork management

playbooks.name: Strategic Partnership Formation
playbooks.trigger: Major partnership opportunity requires rapid joint venture or alliance formation
playbooks.response: Deal structuring, due diligence, legal documentation, integration planning, announcement coordination

playbooks.name: Competitive Acquisition
playbooks.trigger: Opportunity to acquire competitor and consolidate market position
playbooks.response: Acquisition strategy, valuation, financing, regulatory approval, integration planning

playbooks.name: Aggressive Price Disruption (Offensive)
playbooks.trigger: Strategic decision to undercut market and gain share through pricing
playbooks.response: Pricing strategy rollout, competitive messaging, sales enablement, margin management

playbooks.name: Strategic Fundraising (IPO/Series)
playbooks.trigger: Market window opens for major fundraising round or IPO
playbooks.response: Roadshow coordination, financial preparation, regulatory filing, investor relations, media strategy

playbooks.name: M&A Target Acquisition (Offensive)
playbooks.trigger: Perfect acquisition target becomes available, need to move in 48 hours
playbooks.response: Rapid due diligence, offer preparation, financing activation, exclusivity negotiation

playbooks.name: Market Timing Play
playbooks.trigger: Market conditions perfect for bold strategic move (expansion, pivot, launch)
playbooks.response: Strategic execution, capital deployment, operational scaling, market positioning

playbooks.name: Portfolio Rebalancing
playbooks.trigger: Strategic decision to divest underperformers and double down on winners
playbooks.response: Divestiture execution, capital reallocation, organizational restructuring, stakeholder communication

playbooks.name: Platform Migration (Offensive)
playbooks.trigger: Strategic decision to migrate to new tech stack with coordinated cutover
playbooks.response: Migration planning, customer communication, parallel operations, cutover execution, rollback readiness

playbooks.name: API Ecosystem Expansion
playbooks.trigger: Strategic decision to open platform to developers and partners
playbooks.response: API launch, developer documentation, partnership onboarding, ecosystem management

playbooks.name: Technical Standard Setting
playbooks.trigger: Opportunity to establish industry standard or protocol adoption
playbooks.response: Coalition building, standards participation, interoperability strategy, adoption campaign

playbooks.name: Acquisition Target Emerges
playbooks.trigger: Perfect company suddenly available for acquisition
playbooks.response: Rapid assessment, offer preparation, financing, due diligence, negotiation

playbooks.name: Regulatory Change Opens Market
playbooks.trigger: New law or regulation creates market opportunity
playbooks.response: Market entry strategy, regulatory compliance, competitive positioning, go-to-market execution

playbooks.name: Competitor Weakness Exploitation
playbooks.trigger: Rival stumbles, opportunity to steal market share
playbooks.response: Competitive campaign, customer acquisition, messaging offensive, market capture

playbooks.name: Technology Breakthrough Deployment
playbooks.trigger: Internal innovation ready to deploy, first-mover advantage available
playbooks.response: Launch coordination, IP protection, market positioning, customer onboarding, competitive defense

playbooks.name: Strategic Alliance Opportunity
playbooks.trigger: Partnership offer from major player requiring rapid decision
playbooks.response: Partnership evaluation, deal structuring, integration planning, announcement coordination
